Name: SUPPORT:  Self-Service New Comment Notification (SAMPLE)
Description: Sample email template that can be sent to your Self-Service customers to notify them a public comment has been added to their case.
Subject: Your case {!Case.CaseNumber} has been updated
Body:
Your case # {!Case.CaseNumber}: {!Case.Subject} has been updated.  Please click on the link below
to view this case on the Self-Service portal.
<insert the link to your Self-Service portal login page here>

{!Organization.Name} Customer Support

Name: Support: Self-Service Reset Password
Description: Notification of new password when self-service password is reset
Subject: Your new GenWatt Self-Service password
Body:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName}, 

Thank you for using GenWatt's customer self-service portal.  Your new password is below. 

Thank you.

GenWatt Customer Support

Name: Support: Self-Service New Login and Password
Description: Notification of login and password to new self-service user
Subject: Your GenWatt Self-Service login and password
Body:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName}, 

Your GenWatt Self-Service login and password information is below. 

Thank you.

GenWatt Customer Support

Name: Support: Case Assignment Notification
Description: Notification to rep when case is auto-assigned
Subject: Case {!Case.CaseNumber}:"{!Case.Subject}" auto-assigned to you

Name: Support: Case Created (Phone Inquiries)
Description: Notification to customer about case created through phone call
Subject: Your Genwatt case number {!Case.CaseNumber} has been recorded

Name: Support: Case Created (Web Inquiries)
Description: Notification to customer about case created online
Subject: {!Organization.Name} Case {!Case.CaseNumber}: {!Case.Subject}
Body:
Dear {!Case.SuppliedName}, 

Thank you for submitting your question to us online.  Case #{!Case.CaseNumber}: "{!Case.Subject}" has been created and a {!Organization.Name} Customer Advocate will get back to you within the next 24 hours.

Thank you,

Customer Advocate Team
{!Organization.Name}

Name: Embed_a_Survey_Link
Description: Boilerplate content for when you embed a link to a survey in an email. You can't embed a survey link if you edit the merge fields or delete this template.
Subject: Your feedback is important. Help us to improve by taking this survey.
HtmlValue:
Hello {{{Recipient.FirstName}}}...

Open Survey


Thank you,
{{{Organization.Name}}}

Name: Embed_a_Survey_Question
Description: Boilerplate content for when you embed a link to a survey in an email. You can't embed a survey question if you edit the merge fields or delete this template.
Subject: Your feedback is important. Help us to improve by taking this survey.
HtmlValue:
Hello {{{Recipient.FirstName}}}...

{{{SurveyQuestion.QuestionName}}}

{{{SurveyQuestion.QuestionHtmlContent}}}


Thank you,
{{{Organization.Name}}}

Name: Sales: New Customer Email
Subject: Welcome to the GenWatt Community
Body:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},

All of us at GenWatt are glad to have {!Account.Name} as a customer. 

I would like to introduce myself as your Account Manager.  Should you have any questions, please feel free to call me at {!User.Phone} or email me at {!User.Email}. 

You can also contact GenWatt on the following numbers: 

Main: 810-545-1000
Sales: 810-545-1222
Customer Service & Support: 810-545-1333
Fax: 810-545-1001

I am confident GenWatt will serve you well and hope to see our relationship grow over the years.

Best Regards, 
{!User.Name}

Name: SUPPORT:  Self-Service Reset Password  (SAMPLE)
Description: Notification of new password when Self-Service password is reset
Subject: Your new {!Organization.Name} Self-Service password
Body:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},

Thank you for contacting customer support.  Your new Self-Service portal password can be found below.

Thank you,

{!User_Name}
{!Organization.Name} Customer Support

Name: Commerce Reorder Portal: Invitation
Description: Invite a contact to a Commerce Reorder Portal.
Subject: Welcome to {!Community_Name}
HtmlValue:
Dear {!Receiving_User.FirstName},

Check out this reorder portal for a simpler way to place repeat orders with {!Organization.Name}. You can view your past orders, modify quantities, place new orders, and view order statuses.

Click the link for access: {!Community_Name}

Regards,
{!Sending_User.Name}
Body:
Dear {!Receiving_User.FirstName},

Check out this reorder portal for a simpler way to place repeat orders with {!Organization.Name}. You can view your past orders, modify quantities, place new orders, and view order statuses.

Click the link for access: {!Community_Name}

Regards,
{!Sending_User.Name}

Name: Support: Escalated Case Reassignment
Description: Case reassignment email to new case owner on escalation
Subject: ESCALATED CASE {!Case.CaseNumber}

Name: Support: Escalated Case Notification
Subject: ESCALATED CASE {!Case.CaseNumber}

Name: Marketing: Product Inquiry Response
Description: Standard email response to website product inquiries
Subject: GenWatt: Thanks for your inquiry
Body:
Dear {!Lead.Name},

Thank you for your inquiry about GenWatt's products.

A representative will contact you shortly.

Thanks,
The GenWatt Team

Name: Support: Case Response
Description: Standardized template for responses to customer inquiries
Subject: Response to your Genwatt Case {!Case.CaseNumber}: {!Case.Subject}

Name: SUPPORT:  Self-Service New User Login Information (SAMPLE)
Description: Notification of login and password to new Self-Service user
Subject: Your {!Organization.Name} Self-Service username and password
Body:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},

Your {!Organization.Name} Self-Service portal login and password information is below.

Thank you,

{!Organization.Name} Customer Support

Name: Approve Opportunity Discount
Subject: Please approve this discounted opportunity
Body: {!User.Manager}, The {!Opportunity.Name} has been discounted. Please approve this discount. Thank you.
